BUILDER.NAME: add
BUILDER.DESCRIPTION: Add a role reaction on a message

REACTION.NAME: reaction
REACTION.DESCRIPTION: The reaction on which to give a role

ROLE.NAME: role
ROLE.DESCRIPTION: The role to give on the reaction

MESSAGE_ID.NAME: message_id
MESSAGE_ID.DESCRIPTION: The id of the message on which to add the role react

SUCCESS: The reaction `{{emoji}}` now give the role.s **{{role}}** on the message {{link}}
ERROR: Sorry, but I cant use the reaction '{{emoji}}' on the message {{link}}
ALREADY_USE: The reaction `{{emoji}}` is already use for the role.s **{{roles}}** on the message {{link}}
